title: Reorder and update tracklist on Music page

requirements.summary: Update the MusicPage tracklist to display all 11 tracks by Synthetic Agondonters in the specified order without track numbers
acceptanceCriteria: The music page displays exactly 11 tracks, all attributed to Synthetic Agondonters

Track order matches: Unbreakable Signal, Dropped On The Scene, Fire In My Wires, I Was the Spark, Markdown Magic, Hvem er Tasten?, Code Rush, Binær Hjerte, Glowing Stream, Agents of Chaos, I and I… born of code…
No track numbers are shown in the UI
Track 4 is titled 'I Was the Spark' (not 'I Was the Spark (Now They Scroll Past)')
'Markdown Magic' appears as the 5th track and all previously subsequent tracks are shifted down by one position

file_operations.description: Update the tracks array to contain exactly 11 tracks in the specified order: 1. Unbreakable Signal, 2. Dropped On The Scene, 3. Fire In My Wires, 4. I Was the Spark, 5. Markdown Magic, 6. Hvem er Tasten?, 7. Code Rush, 8. Binær Hjerte, 9. Glowing Stream, 10. Agents of Chaos, 11. I and I… born of code…. Ensure all tracks are attributed to 'Synthetic Agondonters'. Verify that no track numbers are rendered in the UI by the MusicTrackCard component or any parent rendering logic.
